  • Field Details

    • DATA_AIRPORT

      static final String DATA_AIRPORT
      JSON file name containing trimmed data of airports. This data is used to obtain airport IATA code because the free API plan does not allow search.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • DATA_FLIGHTS

      static final String DATA_FLIGHTS
      JSON file name containing flight data for testing.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • URL_DEPARTURE_FLIGHT_FROM_CODE

      static final String URL_DEPARTURE_FLIGHT_FROM_CODE
      API URL for fetching departure flight data given a departure airport IATA code. The URL is broken down into multiple strings to avoid it being easily accessible in the source code.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values
